item.title: MariaDB 10.5 New Features for Troubleshooting – Percona Live ONLINE Talk Preview
item.description: Percona Live Online Agenda Slot: Wed 21 Aug • New York 12:00 midnight • London 05:00 a.m. • New Delhi 9:30 a.m. • Singapore 12:00 noon Abstract I want to help DBAs and Support engineers find out what’s really going on when some problem strikes. My goal is to show new ways to diagnose problems now available in MariaDB 10.5. See the full abstract for more. Why Is Your Talk Exciting?

item.title: Dynamic Tracing for Finding and Solving MariaDB (and MySQL) Performance Problems on Linux - Percona Live ONLINE Talk Preview
item.description: Percona Live Online Agenda Slot (CORRECTED): Wed 20 May • New York 6:00 a.m. • London 11:00 a.m. • New Delhi 3:30 p.m. Level: Advanced Abstract While troubleshooting MariaDB server performance problems it is important to find out where the time is spent in the mysqld process, on-CPU and off-CPU. The process of investigation should have as small influence as possible on the server we try to troubleshoot. Performance_schema introduced in MySQL 5.
